reviews.customers_say: Customers love the dress's appearance, with one noting it has a classy, expensive feel.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVED THIS DRESS
items.body: This dress was everything i hoped for! I ended up using it for my wedding. The measurements were spot on as well. Quality was great. Overall very impressed! Read more
items.author: Jayden

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning Red Dress
items.body: The sequin appliquÃ©s are petite and adorable, giving the dress a classy expensive feel and look. The length was perfect! The color red is incomparable. Amazing dress! Read more
items.author: M&Ms Mommy!

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty
items.body: Perfect dress for a budget. But not for a short girl had to have hemmed almost a foot. Fits good and was comfortable. Not as wow sparkling as pictures but still pretty Read more
items.author: Kadie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning!
items.body: Dress well made and fit was perfect. Bought as a prom dress and my granddaughter was stunning prom night and she was thrilled! Read more
items.author: Donna Newton

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Affordable more than elegant
items.body: Unfinished. Breast padding flimsy and rough. Bottom of dress is stiff and cheap looking. Color is nice but the sequins rough and looks childish. Overall the dress looks more affordable than elegant. Read more
items.author: Mama mata

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening V Neck Formal Mermaid is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening V Neck Formal Mermaid is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening V Neck Formal Mermaid is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Grey, Dusty Pink, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Baby Blue, Lavender, Royal Blue, Mauve, Teal, Turquoise, Dusty Purple, Sky Blue, Gold. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
